info.title: Order Service API
info.description:
This API is for Ordering. For Authentication please pass your API key in the Header as "Apikey: {apikey}", or Alternatively you can login into our OAuth system (See docs https://developer.vumatel.co.za/) and pass your token as header "Authorization: bearer {token}"

DEPRECATION WARNING

The /create-order/ endpoint will soon be deprecated in favour of /isp-order/

get.description: Endpoint GET orders that are in accept or reject state

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

patch.description: Endpoint GET orders that are in accept or reject state

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Vumatel order reference number such as 'VT-1234-5678'.
